"You would be volunteering, so, no, you won't get paid. I will take care of you, you'll only be regressed to a toddler, and we will come up with an antidote, although that may take a while. You would also have to live as a toddler, so no dressing yourself, no adult food, and if you misbehave, you will be punished. You'll want to know the terms before you agree. I have a full-size nursery all ready for the volunteer. It's decorated in white, so it doesn't matter whether it's a girl or boy."
